mapper.sql: id, user_id, alipay_account, alipay_name, encashing_amount, phone, encashed
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bk_encashment (user_id,alipay_account, alipay_name, encashing_amount, phone, encashed) VALUES (#{userId},#{alipayAccount},#{alipayName},#{encashingAmount}, #{phone},#{encashed})
mapper.update: UPDATE bk_encashment SET user_id=#{userId}, alipay_account=#{alipayAccount}, alipay_name=#{alipayName}, encashing_amount=#{encashingAmount}, phone=#{phone}, encashed=#{encashed} WHERE id=#{id}
